Employee Points System

Web app that tracks project work hours for employees with admin and employee functions, clocking in/out, daily reports, project reports. Built with Python/Django with MySQL database and HTML/CSS/Bootstrap for the front-end.

Ruby/Rails

An enrollment app with functionality for instructors to create or delete courses and view enrollment of students, and functionality for students to enroll or drop classes. Built using Ruby on Rails with Active Record and PostgreSQL database, with HTML/CSS/Bootstrap client side.
